text: Take a challenge – Come what may, I am going to smile today and be happy!
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: The world is full of paradoxes; life is full of opposites. The art is to embrace the opposites, accommodate the paradoxes & live with a smile.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Formality is just wrapping paper; belongingness is the actual substance.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Compassion & love are your very nature; these will always remain in you.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Whatever you can change – change. What you cannot change, accept.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Sadhana helps you maintain your centeredness and not be shaken by small events.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Deep inside, you are a fountain of bliss… a fountain of joy!
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Even if imperfections come your way, don’t give them importance - they are like wrinkles on a cloth.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: The smile is the secret of life. The smile is the sacred gift of life.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: When you wake up every morning, look into a mirror and smile. That smile gives courage, energy and confidence to move on in life.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: You can’t control what others think about you. Let them think whatever they want; why lose your peace?
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Uncertainty causes craving for stability. But when you realize the certainty of the Self, you can be at ease with the uncertainty of the world.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Usually in life, you give up in anger; if you learn to give up in wisdom, you will never get frustrated.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: In ignorance, anger is cheap and smile is costly. In knowledge, smile is free and anger is expensive.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: When your mind is not complaining, and you are responsible, courageous and confident—you become inexplicably beautiful.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Contentment is the goal of life.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: The whole planet is one organism. Everybody and everything is connected — one consciousness manifesting in many forms.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Life is bigger than our limited roles and identities. You are a beautiful citizen of this beautiful planet. Compassion & love are your very nature; these will always remain in you.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Spirituality is getting in touch with yourself - the core of your being.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Don’t keep any corner of your existence away from divinity. Let the divine be interwoven into every aspect of life.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Whatever you do, do it with totality — that brings perfection.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: A calm mind, a smiling heart and a selfless act — these three make a human being divine.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: When you feel low, know that life is giving you a chance to become stronger, deeper and more centered.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Faith is realizing that you always get what you need.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: The sign of intelligence is smiling through difficulties and challenges.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: If you can win over your own mind, you can win over the whole world.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Don’t be afraid of making mistakes; only be afraid of repeating them.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Be a light to yourself, and you will automatically light up everyone around you.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: When you make service your sole purpose in life, it eliminates fear, brings focus, and fills you with joy.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: The measure of your success is the number of smiles you bring on people’s faces.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: When you stop blaming and start taking responsibility, that’s when your real journey begins.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Don’t postpone your happiness. If you can’t be happy now, you can’t be happy ever.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Meditation is not concentration; it is de-concentration. It is the art of letting go.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: When you are established in the Self, nothing can shake you. You become like the sky — untouched by clouds.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: The more you share joy with others, the more it grows in you.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Confidence is that inner voice that says ‘I am not afraid.’ It comes when you connect to the source within.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: When you are grateful, every little thing in life becomes a celebration
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Enthusiasm is the sign of the Spirit. When you lose enthusiasm, you are disconnected from your source.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Life teaches you the art of letting go with every breath. When you let go, joy flows in.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Don’t wait for perfection in the world - see perfection in everything that exists.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Knowledge is the greatest wealth. It brings inner strength and dissolves ignorance like the sunrise dissolves darkness.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: True freedom is not doing whatever you want, but being free from craving and aversion.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: You don’t have to look for peace. You are peace - just remove the noise and it appears.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: When you serve others without expecting anything in return, grace flows into your life effortlessly.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: When you are hollow and empty within, creativity dawns, love flows, and joy dances in every cell of your being.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: Spirituality is not an escape from life; it is the art of living life totally.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: When you are centered, the outer world cannot disturb you. It can only reflect your peace.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: The purpose of life is to expand happiness - within you and around you.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar

text: See a mistake as a mistake, not as ‘my’ or ‘his’ mistake. ‘My’ means guilt; ‘his’ means anger.
author: — Gurudev Sri Sri Ravishankar
